mapper.select: SELECT USER_NUMBER, USER_EMAIL, USER_NICKNAME,PROFILE_IMAGE_PATH, (select count(*) from CLEAN_MY_PROJECT CMP WHERE USER_NUMBER=#{userNumber})AS MY_PLOGGING FROM CLEAN_USER WHERE USER_NUMBER =#{userNumber}

select DISTINCT CS.USER_NUMBER, CS.SPOT_NUMBER, CRS.REPORT_NUMBER,CRS.SPOT_LAT,CRS.SPOT_LNG,SPOT_NAME from CLEAN_SPOT CS JOIN CLEAN_REPORT_SPOT CRS on CS.SPOT_NUMBER = CRS.SPOT_NUMBER where USER_NUMBER=#{userNumber}

select route_number, user_number, route_name, route_slat, route_slng, route_sname, route_dlat, route_dlng, route_dname, route_v1lat, route_v1lng, route_v1name, route_v2lat, route_v2lng, route_v2name, route_v3lat, route_v3lng, route_v3name from CLEAN_ROUTE where USER_NUMBER=#{userNumber}

select CU.USER_NUMBER, CC.CREW_NUMBER,CC.CREW_NAME, CMP.PROJECT_ROLE_NUMBER, CPR.PROJECT_ROLE_NAME, CCP.PROJECT_TITLE,CCP.PROJECT_CONTENT, CCP.CREW_PROJECT_NUMBER, TO_CHAR(CMP.PROJECT_JOIN_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS PROJECT_JOIN_DATE, CCP.PROJECT_DATE,CCP.PROJECT_TIME, CCP.PROJECT_SNAME,CCP.PROJECT_VNAME,CCP.PROJECT_DNAME, CCP.PROJECT_RECRUITMENT,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLEAN_MY_PROJECT WHERE CREW_PROJECT_NUMBER = CCP.CREW_PROJECT_NUMBER AND PROJECT_ROLE_NUMBER IN (1, 2) ) AS PROJECT_MEMBER_COUNT,(CASE WHEN CCP.PROJECT_DATE < sysdate THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS IS_PAST_PROJECT from CLEAN_MY_PROJECT CMP join CLEAN_USER CU on CMP.USER_NUMBER = CU.USER_NUMBER JOIN CLEAN_CREW CC on CMP.CREW_NUMBER = CC.CREW_NUMBER JOIN CLEAN_CREW_PROJECT CCP on CMP.CREW_PROJECT_NUMBER = CCP.CREW_PROJECT_NUMBER JOIN CREW_PROJECT_ROLE CPR on CMP.PROJECT_ROLE_NUMBER = CPR.PROJECT_ROLE_NUMBER WHERE CU.USER_NUMBER=#{userNumber} ORDER BY CCP.PROJECT_DATE DESC
